disableParam_NT.Wiki: Parameters marked with are excluded in the NT version package.

menuType.Wiki: Specifies the type of tutorial menu to display

triggerType.Wiki: Display timing (default: 0: -). You will see this tutorial when you open this menu. Specify 0: - if you do not want to display it when you open the menu.

repeatType.Wiki: Number of times a tutorial can be displayed

imageId.Wiki: Specifies the tutorial image ID to display (default: 0). Specify 0 if you do not want to display the image

unlockEventFlagId.Wiki: Event flag ID for display permission (default: 0). It will not be displayed until this flag is set. Specify 0 if you always want to allow

textId.Wiki: ID of the text to be displayed in the tutorial [TutorialText.xlsm]. This text ID is used for both Title and Body

displayMinTime.Wiki: Shortest display guaranteed time [seconds]. Even if it is closed due to an event etc., it will be closed after displaying at least this time. It's only for toast, so it's ignored in modals

displayTime.Wiki: Display time [seconds]. It will close automatically after this time has passed since the toast was displayed. It's only for toast, so it's ignored in modals
